title: Interpretation of seeing fasting iftar in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a fasting person breaking his fast in a dream or a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Fasting is abstaining from eating and drinking until the time of breaking the fast stipulated in Sharia law, which is the time of sunset. It has various and multiple connotations, and interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a fasting person’s breakfast in a dream, according to the condition and circumstances of the person who saw it, and whether he was single, a woman, married, married, or celibate. pregnant. Today, through the vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a fasting person’s breakfast in a dream, based on the opinion of ancient interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, on this. Follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees a fasting person’s breakfast in a dream: Seeing a fasting person’s breakfast in a dream at the time of breaking the fast. See: Releasing anxiety, eliminating sorrows, and releasing anxiety. Seeing a fasting person’s breakfast in a dream at the time of breaking his fast may indicate that he will perform Umrah in Ramadan, and God knows best. Intentionally seeing breakfast during the day. Ramadan in a dreamIt indicates a great catastrophe that will befall God. Seeing breakfast and refusing to fast in a dream indicates the dreamer’s disdain and contempt for the teachings of religion and their contempt for him, and that he must repent for this sin. See also: Interpretation of seeing the coming of Ramadan in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a fasting person’s breakfast in a dream for a man: Seeing a fasting man in a dream breaking his fast indicates that God will provide him with goodness, blessings, and many good deeds. Seeing a fasting person in a dream breaking his fast forgetfully indicates what the dreamer possesses, with a sound mind, wisdom, and the ability to manage things well. A man saw that he is breaking his fast while he is fasting because he feels hungry. It indicates To the things they longed for and expected to come true soon. A married man seeing his wife breaking the fast in Ramadan shows that you feel strong feelings of love towards him. See also: Written supplication: Oh God, let us reach Ramadan. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees in a dream breaking the fast in Ramadan: Seeing in a dream a young man fasting and breaking his fast may indicate... His marriage to a girl with good morals is approaching. A young man dreams that they are fasting in his house. This indicates that God will give him a lot of money in the coming period. A young man sees a fasting person breaking his fast by forgetting in a dream. It shows that he will get rid of the difficulties and problems that stand in his way. See also: Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a fasting person breaking his fast in an unmarried woman’s dream: Seeing one person breaking his fast in a dream is an indication that he will achieve something that he has longed for and sought for a long time. Seeing one person breaking his fast in a dream is a sign of the goodness that she will obtain and the source that will come to her soon. Seeing a single person fasting And he wants to break the fast in a dream. It indicates getting rid of all the problems and sorrow in her life. Seeing someone who dreams of a fasting person and breaking his fast may be a sign of feelings of admiration for her. Seeing a single woman who wants to break the fast while fasting expresses her desire to be connected to her need for love and affection and her lack of interest. See also: Interpretation Seeing joy equipment in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman fasting iftar in a dream: Seeing a married woman wanting to break her fast while fasting in a dream indicates something she hopes will happen soon, God willing. Seeing a married woman in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend ignoring me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend ignoring me in a dream If you want to know whether the interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend ignoring me in a dream, all these and more details that interest you, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators... Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend ignoring me in a dream Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend ignoring me in a dream can be That it leads to some crises, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees his girlfriend ignoring him in a dream, this may indicate some problems, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees that her boyfriend is ignoring her in a dream, this may lead to problems that she faces, and God knows best. When a single girl sees her friend ignoring her in a dream, this may indicate I am in a bad psychological state, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my friend betrayed me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my friend who betrayed me in a dream could lead to a lack of trust in him, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees that my friend is cheating on me in a dream, this may indicate a benefit that one will gain, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing betrayal can indicate the many pressures he went through, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you see the betrayal of a friend in a dream, it may express the psychological pressures he is going through, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my old friend in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my old friend in a dream can lead to good news, And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Like a dreamer who saw his old friend good, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her old friend in a dream, this may represent the achievement of goals, and God is Most Knowing. If a married woman sees her old friend in a dream, this may indicate her friend’s need for help, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my friend who He left me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my friend who left me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing someone leaving you in a dream can lead to a plot, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a single girl sees him leaving her, it may express intrigue and anticipation, and God knows the unseen. When she sees Someone leaves you, this may indicate that there is a problem, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my friend’s brother in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing my friend’s brother in a dream could indicate goodness and happiness, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, seeing my friend’s brother in a dream may express concern about something related to your friend’s brother. And God knows the unseen. When you see my friend’s brother in a dream, this may be evidence that you are thinking about your friend’s brother, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my friend with a young man in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my friend with a young man in a dream. Perhaps seeing my friend with her lover will lead to love, and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate On his love for his friend and his attachment to her, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her friend with her lover, she may be interested in her, and God knows best. Also, seeing the dreamer dating her friend and her lover may indicate the loss of her friend, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my friend’s father in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my friend’s father in a dream. Seeing my friend’s father A friend can indicate kindness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his friend’s father happy in a dream, he may be tired

title: The most important interpretations of seeing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing coins in a dream is one of the visions that whoever sees it wants to know its meaning and the interpretations that it brings for good or bad, and the interpretation of seeing money differs for everyone who is single, married, pregnant or male, so we will mention today. – Interpretation of more than one case according to the interpretations of senior interpreters, including Al-Dhaheri, Ibn Sirin and others. Seeing coins in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing coins in a dream Senior commentators indicated that seeing coins in general indicates goodness and livelihood, and in many cases it is one of the symbols of good news for the fortune teller. The more coins seen in the dream, the greater the dream and the greater the amount of livelihood the dreamer will receive in the coming days. Whoever dreams that he is collecting coins from the streets and feels exhausted while collecting them, this dream symbolizes the difficulties and hardships that the dreamer will face in his life, but he can overcome all of these due to his perseverance to reach his goals. Interpretation of seeing coins and there were five coins, the dream indicates that the dreamer misses his five daily prayers, so he must get closer to God (Glory be to Him) and perform all obligations. Seeing coins in a dream by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees a large number of coins in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretations, the dream indicates problems in this world. Whoever finds in his dream a bag containing coins while walking in the street, the dream indicates achieving the goals that the dreamer was struggling for For her for a long time. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will be able to reach the life partner he has always dreamed of. Seeing counterfeit coins in a dream is a sign that many unpleasant things will happen to the fortuneteller and he must be careful in the coming period. You will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin's dreams and visions on the Egyptian dream interpretation site from Google. Seeing coins in a single woman's dream An unmarried woman who dreams of collecting coins, the dream indicates the extent of the difficulties and problems that she will face in her married life in the future and the vision is evidence of distress and fear. If she feels happy when collecting coins, tell her that she married a righteous man. An unmarried woman receives coins in a dream from someone she does not know, the dream indicates the good news that will reach the viewer in the coming days. Interpretation of seeing giving money to unmarried women If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone she knows gives her some coins, the dream indicates her official relationship with this person. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretations that an unmarried woman sees one of her friends giving her a set of coins, evidence that she will face many difficulties with that friend. Seeing coins in a dream for a woman Married Seeing coins in a dream for a married woman is a vision that has many connotations. If the coins are silver, the dream indicates that she will give birth to girls, while gold coins are a

title: Interpretation of dreams about a cat that speaks like a human for a single woman

preview.html: But as we agreed before, there is no vision that has a single interpretation and that is why today, through gptafser.com/, we present the different interpretations and symbols of this vision in detail for men and women.Interpretation of seeing a cat talking like a human in a dream about a single girlThe only girl who dreams of a cat She talks to her for a long time about the people closest to her. The vision indicates that there are many friends of the visionary. They are trying to get close to her to harm her, take advantage of her, and God knows best. As for the only girl who sees herself, she talks to the cat about many things in her life in a dream. The dream indicates The friends in the dreamer’s life are good. They love her, desire her, and guide her to the right path in many cases, and God knows best. If one girl sees that there is more than one person talking to a cat in a dream and just looking at them, this is evidence that the dreamer will make some wrong decisions in his life. Which exposes her to many problems in her life, and God knows best. As for the unmarried girl who sees herself sitting with a cat and talking to it about a handsome young man while she is smiling in the dream. The dream symbolizes the presence of a handsome and respectable young man who is proposing to marry the dreamer soon, and God knows best. The appearance of a cat talking like a human with The unmarried girl in her house in a dream. It is an indication of the stability of the dreamer’s family life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a black cat attacking me. Interpretation of seeing a cat talking like a human in a dream about a married woman. A married woman sees a cat talking like a human to her husband and gets very close to him in the dream. It is a sign There is a cheerful and deceptive woman trying to get close to the dreamer’s husband during this period, which gets him into a lot of trouble, and God knows best. As for seeing a married woman talking to a cat in a dream while her husband is looking at the cat, the vision shows that there is a girl who has met his wife. But he strongly warns her about him. He assures her that he does not reassure her, and God knows best. A married woman sees in a dream a cat talking like a human to her friends, and she is very surprised by that. The intention is to draw the viewer’s attention that she will be exposed to great betrayal in her life in general, and the betrayal of her friends in particular, and God knows best. Seeing a beautiful cat talking in a dream with a husband A married woman. It is a sign that her husband knows a young woman next to her and he must be careful of that in order to protect her home, and God knows best. Seeing a group of beautiful small white cats in a dream for a married woman. Good news of pregnancy, good offspring, or good upbringing of children, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a cat talking like a man in a dream about a man and its meaning. As for the man who sees himself talking a lot with a cat in a dream about his private affairs in the dream and he is sad, it is a sign that this man is going through a turbulent time in his private life, and God knows best. A man sees a cat talking like a man to more than One of his close friends in a dream. The vision indicates that the dreamer will get into a lot of trouble and get involved in it. Because of some of his close friends, and God knows best. And if a man dreamed that he was talking to a cat about his problems with his family in a dream, and she was laughing at him a lot. The dream shows that he is suffering From Azam

title: Interpretation of seeing celebrities in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing celebrities in a dream: If the dreamer sees a famous person in his home, this dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to a major financial crisis. Seeing this person imagines celebrities, and this indicates in the dream that the dreamer is characterized by bad qualities as well as deception and lies. The dreamer who sees a sad artist in a dream shows his ability to solve all the problems that He faces it with ease. If one sees that he has become a famous singer in a dream, this symbolizes the anxiety, anxiety and pain that the dreamer is suffering from. Interpretation of seeing a famous singer in a dream The dreamer seeing a famous singer This dream in the dream indicates the success and excellence that the dreamer achieves in studying. Seeing a famous singer in A dream means joys, happy occasions, and good news for the dreamer, God willing. If a single young man sees a famous singer in a dream, this indicates that he will soon marry a good and beloved girl. Seeing a famous singer in a dreamer’s dream symbolizes the arrival of sustenance, kindness, abundant money, and happiness for the dreamer. Celebrities in a dream and seeing Ahmed Ezz Seeing the man, for the artist Ahmed Ezz in a dream, symbolizes the arrival of kindness, livelihood, and abundant money that the dreamer will receive. Shaking hands with the star Ahmed Ezz in the dreamer’s dream means that the dreamer will achieve all his dreams that he was striving to achieve. I am keeping up with the famous Ahmed Ezzi The dream indicates that the dreamer will reach A high position in his workplace, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the artist Ahmed Ezz wearing torn clothes, then this dream indicates poverty, sadness, anxiety and anguish. Seeing celebrities in a dream in a single woman’s dream: Seeing a single woman meeting a famous man and going with him to a wonderful place indicates happiness. Which the girl will have. If single people shake hands with a celebrity, this means that they will reach a prominent position in the near future. If a free girl sees the fact that she has become famous on social media, this indicates an urgent marriage with her. Seeing a celebrity in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will achieve Great success in the coming period by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about a famous personInterpretation of a dream about a famous person Implicit in the dream indicates that the dreamer will hear God’s good news. Seeing the dreamer embracing a celebrity in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve his goals that he was trying to achieve. If a married person sees a famous person holding him in a dream This symbolizes the stability of the family and marital happiness for the dreamer. Seeing a famous person hugging him in his sleep means that he will achieve a lot of success and distinction in his life. Interpretation of seeing the artist Ahlam in a dream: If a person sees an opening in a dream, this means in the dream that the dreamer will succeed in his studies with distinction, God willing. Seeing a star Shining in a dream means that the dreamer will hear good news in the coming period. Seeing a single young man dreaming of a singer in a dream, indicating that he will soon marry a loving and tender-hearted girl. An unmarried woman hugging the star dreams in a dream, symbolizing the coming of kindness, abundant living and abundant money for the visionary. Interpretation of seeing a broadcaster in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a broadcaster in a dream shows positive changes

Interpretation of a dream about a famous personInterpretation of a dream about a famous person Implicit in the dream indicates that the dreamer will hear God’s good news. Seeing the dreamer embracing a celebrity in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve his goals that he was trying to achieve. If a married person sees a famous person holding him in a dream This symbolizes the stability of the family and marital happiness for the dreamer. Seeing a famous person hugging him in his sleep means that he will achieve a lot of success and distinction in his life. Interpretation of seeing the artist Ahlam in a dream: If a person sees an opening in a dream, this means in the dream that the dreamer will succeed in his studies with distinction, God willing. Seeing a star Shining in a dream means that the dreamer will hear good news in the coming period. Seeing a single young man dreaming of a singer in a dream, indicating that he will soon marry a loving and tender-hearted girl. An unmarried woman hugging the star dreams in a dream, symbolizing the coming of kindness, abundant living and abundant money for the visionary. Interpretation of seeing a broadcaster in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a broadcaster in a dream shows positive changes

title: Interpretation of tree leaves in a dream for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman

preview.html: Seeing leaves whether they are dry, green, wet, dry, dry, green, or yellow, picking, sweeping leaves, eating, picking, falling, and more, Ibn Sirin’s tree, interpretation of a dream about tree leaves According to Ibn Sirin, dreaming about elements of nature, including tree leaves, is one of the most common dreams, especially for women, as it has great meanings and varies depending on the circumstances they are experiencing. So find out in this matter whether the meaning of dreaming about dry leaves is positive for your life or, on the contrary, you should be careful. Leaves in a dream indicate clothes, except for fig leaves, which are sad, and whoever sees that he is eating the paper of the Qur’an with writing on it will suffer from glaucoma. Seeing it Alone is a sign of guidance after deception or a herald of the arrival of the absent or renewal of livelihood. If you dream of tree leaves, this indicates happiness and wonderful improvement in your work. Withered leaves indicate false hopes, and dark signs will throw your soul into a whirlpool of despair and loss. If a girl dreams of withered leaves, she will be alone. On the road to marriage. This can sometimes involve death. If the leaves are green and soft, you will have an inheritance and marry a rich, charming husband. Dream Interpretation of Leaves for Single WomenMost often, this dream symbolizes your great passion for your work and the extent of your ambitions and dreams on a professional and personal level. The connotations of dry leaves are positive and indicate good health and a personality ready to face difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about vacations for a married woman, but if you are married, this dream may have some negative connotations that indicate a difficult marital or family life. You are facing several problems with your partner that need to be resolved as quickly as possible. So that your family is not affected negatively. Interpretation of a dream about vacations for a pregnant woman: Dry paper has a positive connotation if you are pregnant, as it shows that the health of the fetus is good and there is no need to worry, but you must pay more attention to your health and not neglect your comfort and health in this delicate period. From your life. Other interpretations of a dream about leaves: Falling leaves or seeing yellow leaves indicate financial deterioration, problems in collecting money, and even debts. As for the green leaf in a dream, it shows happiness and luck in your life, and this dream is good news for you. Seeing leaves in a dream indicates the fulfillment of your dreams and aspirations, and the dreamer will achieve what he wants and respond to what he wants. You will get fame, a title, and things that are contrary to what you want. You will begin to move in the right direction. The leaves of the tree indicate family life as well as professional life, and in professional and private life, the face of insight will laugh and it will witness many surprises and developments. Falling leaves in a dream indicates decadence and material and moral backwardness, and it will drown. In debt, and it was not enough, he will also receive unpleasant news and feel anxious. Sweeping leaves in a dream It indicates the effort that the dreamer will make to put things right, and the person who was seen sweeping leaves from trees will try to come back, collect

title: Seeing a ring and a hermit in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a ring and a ring in a dream or a ring or a ring on someone is associated with happy occasions such as engagement or wedding, and seeing a ring and a ring in a dream is one of the things that carries many interpretations and associations depending on the social status of the viewer in addition to some subtle details in the dream, and we will present this to you. The article is about the interpretation of seeing a ring and a cage in a dream, so follow us. Seeing a ring and a hermit in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a ring and a ring in a dream varies from one person to another. This depends on the social status of the beholder and the shape and type of material that makes up the ring or ring in the dream. Scholars and dream interpreters have unanimously agreed on Seeing a ring and a ring in a dream is one of the most praiseworthy visions in general, because it indicates the completion and completion of things. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a ring or a ring in a dream as a sign of the abundance of goodness and abundance. While Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a ring and a ring in a dream as evidence of Diligence and constant striving to achieve dreams and aspirations. Buying a ring or ring in a dream indicates marriage, recovery from illness, or fulfillment of desires. While selling a ring or ring in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer a great material or moral loss in his life. Taking off the ring in a dream indicates That the dreamer will face a lot of problems in the coming period of his life, and it could also be a sign of separation or a quarrel with a loved one. Breaking a ring or ring in a dream is a sign of divorce or separation and can also be interpreted as a sign of freedom from restrictions and responsibilities placed upon On the shoulder of the dreamer. A silver ring in a dream shows the dreamer’s faith and piety. A golden ring in a dream shows the tasks and responsibilities entrusted to the fortuneteller in his life, and it is praiseworthy to see it in a woman’s dream. Seeing a gold and silver ring together indicates the dreamer’s attempt to balance religious and secular matters Seeing a golden ring containing diamond lobes shows the extent of the fortuneteller’s fatigue and diligence in achieving something worldly that he so desperately seeks. As for seeing copper or iron rings, it is considered an unfavorable vision for the dreamer. Seeing a ring made of wood in a dream means that the dreamer will be exposed to lies and hypocrisy from someone close to him. From him.Interpretation of seeing a ring and a locket in an unmarried girl’s dream. Scientists interpret seeing a ring and a locket in an unmarried girl’s dream as clear evidence of engagement or marriage in the near future - God willing - Almighty. It also indicates this girl’s effort and diligence in achieving her dreams. Finding a ring Or a ring in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she will find a suitable groom for her and that she will live a happy life with him - God willing. While losing a ring or locket in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she is living in an emotional relationship that portends failure. Interpretation of seeing a ring and a ring in a dream Married Woman: Scientists interpret seeing a ring and a ring in a married woman’s dream as meaning that the dreamer will be happy with the news of her pregnancy in the near future – God willing. Also

title: Dental filling in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Today, on our website, we present, through the following lines, interpretations of seeing tooth fillings for singles, married people, pregnant women, young people, and males. Interpretation of seeing a tooth filling in a single girl’s dream: Scientists have confirmed that seeing a tooth filling or filling falling out in a dream is for an unmarried girl. It has many meanings and different connotations between good and evil. When a single girl dreams of filling a molar in a dream, it is an indication of the strength of her character and her will to achieve goals and desires. Seeing the correct filling of a molar in an unmarried girl’s dream means that the time of her engagement to a good man is approaching. As for whoever sees the tooth falling out in the dream, it indicates the problems he faces. The dreamer. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about removing damaged teeth. Interpretation of seeing a tooth falling out in a married woman’s dream. Seeing a tooth filling up in a married woman’s dream is full of details that lead to many meanings and connotations. A married woman who sees a tooth falling out in her dream is a metaphor for the annoying things she sees in her daily life. As for Seeing a rotten tooth falling out or being extracted in a married woman’s dream is a metaphor for the visionary’s ability to overcome bad things with wisdom. To see a rotten tooth falling out in a married woman’s dream symbolizes revealing the secrets of her life to others. The vision also indicates that she will enter into an argument with her husband’s family or friends. Filling a worn out tooth in a married woman’s dream is a good promise to get rid of marital problems. Interpretation of seeing tooth fillings in a dream for a man and its meaning. When a man dreams that he is at the doctor to fill his molars in a dream, this represents a metaphor for his efforts and efforts in searching for a suitable job. As for the one who dreams When a tooth falls out, it means that its secrets will be revealed. See also: Interpretation of a dream about tooth decay for individuals. The meaning of seeing a tooth filled in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A pregnant woman who dreams of a tooth being filled without pain is considered a good sign that the time of birth is approaching. It also indicates that the delivery will be easy without any problems. As for those who They see themselves filling their molars with great pain, as this symbolizes a failed birth, and God knows best. And if a pregnant woman sees that a molar is filling beautifully, this means that she will give birth to a beautiful girl. Seeing a molar filling with difficulty in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a boy. Interpretation of seeing a tooth filled in a dream For youth and its meaning When a young man sees a tooth filling up in a dream, this indicates that he is a stubborn personality and does not give up easily. The vision also shows that the young man possesses distinctive qualities such as intelligence and wisdom in dealing with matters. Seeing a young man grinding his teeth tirelessly in a dream means that the young man will reach an excellent position. Also That he obtained a lot of money without making an effort, such as inheritance. You may be interested: The upper molar falls out in a dream. The meaning of the dream of filling a molar in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Sheikh Ibn Shirin said: Seeing a molar in a dream for a married woman. It also symbolizes improving her relationship with someone Her friends. Ibn Sirin confirmed that teeth in a dream symbolize relatives, when a married woman sees a tooth filled in a dream. It is a metaphor for her reconciliation with one of her relatives, who had a rival between them

title: Interpretation of dream books about a single woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream book booksIt is known that T. Faisal’s dream books alone have many interpreters, as the dream of the book books in the dream indicates the beginning of a new stage in the life of the dreamer, then due to the change in the interpretation of the vision from one person to another, we will know what the book belongs to He wrote it in a dream. Interpretation of the book written about an unmarried woman with a man she loves in a dream. We will inform you through the different site about what they talked about, interpreting the dreams to interpret the dream book for single people in detail as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is writing her book for someone she loves, this indicates Achieving the desires and goals that this girl seeks in her next life. The books of the book of an unmarried girl are considered public and official, and this indicates the approaching official relationship of this single girl in the coming days. Some commentators have confirmed that the books of the book in the dream of the unmarried girl are among the signs that It indicates that her life will change for the better in the coming period. If she wrote the book “The Single Girl” while she was a student studying this year, this is a sign of excellence in studies and obtaining final grades. If she sees that her lover is the one who appears with her in a dream in the books of her book, this indicates On the sincerity of this person’s intention to marry her in a real way. Interpretation of the books of the book for single people Here is the interpretation of the dream from the books of the book and preparation for single marriage, which is what the interpretation scholars revealed through the following: A dream of writing the book in the mosque for an unmarried woman, then this is evidence that this girl has committed Some taboo things, and she will wake up and stop doing those actions. As for whoever saw that she was writing the book in general, this is evidence that this girl reached the places she was looking for. And if she saw that she was writing her book while she is not working at the present time, this is evidence that she will get On separate opportunities for work in the coming period. Dream interpreters say: If an unmarried woman sees her book written, this is a sign of her marriage to a good man. If an unmarried girl sees a book written about someone she knows, this is a sign that she will join this person in a project In the coming days. If the girl sees that she does not want her book written in a dream, this indicates that a man has proposed to her, but she will reject this man and will not accept his marriage. Interpretation of the book’s books for married women. If a married woman sees herself in a dream writing the book to an unrelated person. If a married woman sees herself writing a book for a friend in a dream for a stranger to her, this may indicate that she will be exposed to a scandal in the coming period. If a married woman sees that she is writing her book for a friend, then this It indicates sincerity of feelings of friendliness and respect in reality. Or this may be a sign that he will join this friend in a new project in the near future. If a married woman sees that she is writing her book about her first lover, this indicates that he will appear again in her life. Some translators have confirmed the
